meanings.definition: Covered with or smelling of mold
meanings.sent1: The old book in the attic was the mouldiest one.
meanings.sent2: The bread left in the damp room became the mouldiest.
meanings.sent3: Even the mouldiest cheese couldn't ruin the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had the mouldiest walls, like a forgotten memory.
meanings.sent5: The damp cellar had the mouldiest smell, making it hard to breathe.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the bread, that one was the mouldiest.
meanings.sent2: The mouldiest cheese was hidden at the back of the fridge.
meanings.sent3: The mouldiest sandwich won the 'worst lunch' award.
meanings.sent4: Her room was the mouldiest in the house, like a hidden treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The mouldiest corner of the garden held secrets of forgotten plants.
